ru.sugarbaron_bicycles.library.state_machine

Class StateMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.sugarbaron_bicycles.library.state_machine.StateMachine

  • public final class StateMachine
extends java.lang.Object
    provides graph (actually, state machine) provides tools for building structure of this graph, creating states, creating signals, creating jumps and switching states

    • Method Summary

        Returns:

      • createSignal

        public StateMachineSignal createSignal(java.lang.Enum signalName)
        create new signal
        Parameters:
        signalName - - member of enum, created by user. this enum contains names of state machine signals
        Returns:
        new signal

      • getSignalByName

        public StateMachineSignal getSignalByName(java.lang.Enum signalName)
        get signal by name
        Parameters:
        signalName - - member of enum, created by user. this enum contains names of state machine signals
        Returns:
        signal for specified name

      • getSignals

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Enum,StateMachineSignal> getSignals()
        get collection of all state machine signals. key for each signal in this collection is it's signal name. this signal name is a member of enum with signal names, created by user
        Returns:
        collection of all state machine signals

      • getCurrentState

        public StateMachineState getCurrentState()
        get current state
        Returns:
        current state

      • getPreviousState

        public StateMachineState getPreviousState()
        get past state
        Returns:
        past state

      • setJump

        public void setJump(StateMachineState from,
                    StateMachineState to,
                    StateMachineSignal signal)
        set jump between states
        Parameters:
        from - - start state for jump
        to - - destination state for jump
        signal - - signal, which must be received by state machine for jump
        Throws:
        NeedFixCode - in case, when was detected wrong work of a program because of errors in code

      • setStart

        public void setStart(StateMachineState start)
        set initial state for state machine
        Parameters:
        start - - initial state
        Throws:
        NeedFixCode - in case, when was detected wrong work of a program because of errors in code

      • setNextStepSignal

        public void setNextStepSignal(StateMachineSignal signal)
        set signal for next makeStep(). this signal defines a jump, which will be executed, when makeStep() will be invoked. this method is a way to deliver a signal to state machine. this method must be invoked for every makeStep()
        Parameters:
        signal - - signal for making next state machine step

      • makeStep

        public void makeStep()
              throws java.lang.Exception
        make step of state machine with a signal, delivered by last invocation of setNextStepSignal(). this method resets next step signal after making a step, so setNextStepSignal() must be invoked again for granting ability to make next step
        Throws:
        NeedFixCode - - if setNextStepSignal() was not invoked and signal for step is not set. also NeedFixCode may be thrown by state handlers
        java.lang.Exception - - in case, when state handler throws any exceptions
